resources.string: Please turn on the camera and microphone permissions first

The cloud communication account you are currently using has not activated the audio and video chat room function, and the number of chat rooms created exceeds the limit, please go to the Tencent Cloud official website to open [IM audio and video chat rooms]ï¼šhttps://cloud.tencent.com/document/product/269/11673
The number of groups that a single user can create and join exceeds the limit, please purchase relevant packages, more details:https://cloud.tencent.com/document/product/269/11673
The number of group members exceeds the limit, please refer to it, please purchase the relevant packages, more details:https://cloud.tencent.com/document/product/269/11673

Please turn on the camera permission first
Please turn on the microphone permission first
%s applies for access to the microphone
Needs access to your microphone, and it can be used for functions such as Interactive Video Streaming, Show Live, Video Call, Group Video Call, Multi-person audio and video room, etc.
%s applies for camera permission

Needs access to your camera, and it can be used for functions such as Interactive Video Streaming, Show Live, Video Call, Group Video Call, Multi-person audio and video room, etc. For beauty filters to work, we will collect the facial information captured by your camera in real time to detect your facial features.
